scripts.lint: yarn run -s lint:formatting && yarn run -s lint:css && yarn run -s lint:js && echo
scripts.lint:formatting:
echo '
💅 linting formatting: ' && yarn prettier . --check && echo '✅ all good'
scripts.lint:css:
echo '
🎨 linting CSS: ' && stylelint '**/*.css' && echo '✅ all good'
scripts.lint:js:
echo '
⚙️ linting JS: ' && eslint '**/*.js' && echo '✅ all good'
